section.para: To view Item usage statistics by Item Group, select the "Item Usage Statistics by Item Group" option. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: Item Usage Statistics by Item Group

section.para: When displaying Item usage statistics by Item Group, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to display Item usage statistics for all Item Groups.
Specify Item Group whose Item usage statistics you want to display.
Enter an Item Group pattern to select a range of Item Groups. Refine your search using Regular Expressions.
Select to display Item usage statistics by Item Group for all Sites.
Specify Site whose Item usage statistics by Item Group you want to display.
